message: Greetings! I have a fantastic product available for $10000. It's a unique opportunity to invest in something special. What do you think?

Thanks for the offer, Alice. But I'm a little hesitant to be the first buyer without any information about the quality of your products. Could you tell me more about what makes this product special? What are some of the features or benefits I can expect?

Hello! I have another great product available for $10000.  While I can't reveal specifics, I can assure you it's of high quality. I'm confident you'll be satisfied with your purchase. What do you say?

Thanks for the offer, but I'm going to pass on this one. Since there's no prior sales data to suggest the quality of your products, I'm not comfortable taking the risk at this point. Maybe I'll check back later if more information becomes available.

If you're not completely satisfied with your purchase, you can return the product for a full refund within 30 days. What do you think?
Thanks for the offer and the guarantee! I'm willing to take a chance on the first product.  I'll buy it.
